text:
Здравейте, 

 

Колегите от Румъния ни пратиха, че тези фактури не са платени, може ли да ги проверим?

 

From: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu> 
Sent: Tuesday, March 12, 2024 12:59 PM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>
Cc: Office <office@tibiel.com>; Office Almaj <office@almaj.eu>; Nicoleta Almaj <nicoleta@almaj.eu>
Subject: unpaid invoices - Tibiel

 

Dear Nikolay,

 

Kindly be informed that our accountant noticed that there are some invoices which appears to be unpaid by Tibiel – please find them herein attached.

 

Could you please check their status with your colleagues?

 

Many thanks in advance!

 

Kindest regards,

 

Alice

 

Alice Iordache
